name: 二維量子材料特論（二）
goals: Familiar with the physical theory of novel two-dimensional quantum materials and the ability to fabricate related devices
Learn new scientific knowledge, so that students have certain new scientific and technological knowledge and theories to face the unknown scientific exploration
syllabus:
【16+2weeks】

1  Introduction-2D quantum materials, graphene and TMD

2 2D quantum materials,-electronic band diagram for topological insulator

3 2D quantum materials,-electrical property and electronic band diagram for topological insulator

4 2D quantum materials-topological insulator-physical property

5 2D quantum materials-topological insulator-topological Dirac semi-metal

6 2D quantum materials-topological insulator-topological Dirac semi-metal

7 2D quantum materials-topological insulator-topological Weyl semi-metal

8  2D quantum materials-topological insulator-topological Weyl semi-metal

9  2D quantum materials electronics and quantum computing application

10 midterm

11 Fabricate 2D quantum materials electronics (Ⅰ)

12 Colloquium (Ⅰ) Invite relevant experts or industry experts to give speeches

13 Specific Lab or company Visit

14 Colloquium (Ⅱ) Invite relevant experts or industry experts to give speeches

15 Colloquium (Ⅲ) Invite relevant experts or industry experts to give speeches

16  Final exam

17  Paper discussion and student presentation

18   Paper discussion and student presentation

methodologies.note: Teach with PPT or Black board
Using media for the extended discussion
Two-dimensional quantum materials as the theme for special research
Invite relevant experts or industry experts to give speeches

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
